price: Por certo, quando se lhes dizia: "Não há deus senão Allah", ensoberbeciam-se,
arabic: إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُوٓاْ إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: innahum kānū idhā qīla lahum lā ilāha illā al-lahu yastakbirūna
